review_blob: Tastes a lot like a tripel, sweet not very hopsy. Alright flavour but I wouldnt call it an IPA. Drank at home from bottle 22march15
Very acidic, not very round. Lack depth in flavour, so hard to finish an entire glass. drank from draft at kaapse brouwers 22march15
terrible beer, taste of honey and old hops. heavy round mouthfeel, lacks freshness. drank at home from bottle 22march15
